channel.title: History of Arsenal Football Club | The Invincibles
channel.description: A history of all the famous moments for the Arsenal Football Club. A record 12 FA Cup wins. Going unbeaten in 2003/2004 which immortalised the club.

item.title: arsenal-4-0-aston-villa
item.description: Arsenal win the FA Cup for a record 12 times, punishing Aston Villa 4-0. A wonder goal from Alexis Sanchez put Arsenal in command after Theo Walcott's opener. Per Mertesacker and Olivier Giroud completed the rout.

item.title: arsenal-3-2-hull
item.description: Arsenal staged an incredible fightback after being 2-0 down within 10 minutes against Hull. Santi Cazorla's wonderful freekick put Arsenal back in contention before Koscielny equalised shortly before full time. Aaron Ramsey scored the winner in extra time.

item.title: arsenal-5-2-tottenham-hotspur
item.description: Arsenal put in a 5 star performance to crush fierce rivals Tottenham 5-2. Adebayor opened the scoring before a reckless tackle saw him sent off. Mertesacker equalised before Podolski and Giroud set Arsenal on their way to a memorable victory.

item.title: reading-5-7-arsenal
item.description: Arsenal mount an incredible comeback from being 4-0 down to win 7-5 in extra time. A hat trick from Theo Walcott helped Arsenal recover from an impossible situation.

item.title: arsenal-5-2-tottenham-hotspur
item.description: Arsenal stunned spurs with a magnificent comeback after being 2-0 down early on. A Sagna header and a magnificent long ranger from Van Persie saw Arsenal level at half time. Rosicky put Arsenal ahead and a double from Walcott sent the gunners fans wild.

item.title: arsenal-5-4-manchester-united-penalties
item.description: Arsenal win the FA Cup for the 10th time with a penalty shootout victory over Manchester United. Arsenal were on the back foot for the majority of the game with Patrick Vieira scoring the crucial penalty.

item.title: arsenal-3-1-aston-villa-49-unbeaten
item.description: Arsenal set a record 49 games unbeaten seeing off Aston Villa 3-1. Villa took a shock lead through Hendrie before Robert Pires equalised from the penalty spot. Thierry Henry gave Arsenal the lead before Pires wrapped things up.

item.title: everton-1-4-arsenal
item.description: Arsenal start the defence of their title with a convincing win over Everton

item.title: arsenal-2-1-leicester-city-invincibles
item.description: Arsenal became the first team to win the Premier League unbeaten. Goals from Thierry Henry and Patrick Vieira secured the win over Leicester City.

item.title: leeds-1-4-arsenal
item.description: Arsenal sweep past Leeds with an outstanding attacking display
